level.heading: Statute of limitations for warranties.
level.text: A judicial proceeding for breach of any warranty that arises under § 42-1903.16 shall be commenced within 5 years after the date the warranty period began.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 8-233
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-233, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-1901.07.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 9-82
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 9-82, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-1901.01.
